content: HAT 28 Anchor tester Tester for proof loading and determination of pullout resistance of anchors and DX fasteners ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Accessories for fasteners > Anchor testers and accessories ### FEATURES:Features Compact and easy-to-use Test load can be read directly from the gauge Certified by the VdTÃœV German safety standards authority for compliance with elevator code of practice sheet 104 Suitable for testing anchors with various head forms and of various diameters Suitable for testing existing lifting points in elevator shafts Applications Proof loading: Application of specific test loads to anchors set in various materials Pull-out tests: Determination of pullout resistance of anchors and DX fasteners in test lab or on site Testing hoist anchor points in elevator shafts ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 355338 - Anchor tester HAT 28 Master kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x 0-5kN C HAT 28 Manometer assy - 1x 25kN C HAT-28 Manometer assy - 1x M6, M8, M10, M12, M16 Set of screws - 1x HAT 28 Extractor clamp assy - 1x 0-29mm Adjustable end wrench - 1x 2,5mm Allen wrench - 2x M4X30 Hex skt hd cap screw - 1x , Einmaul SW10 Flat wrench - 1x , Einmaul SW17 Flat wrench - 1x HAT 28 01 Anchor tester - 1x M12x90mm-25KN Ringbolt test adapter assy - 1x M12 kurz Threaded stud adapter - 1x M16 kurz Threaded stud adapter - 1x M20 kurz Threaded stud adapter - 1x M5x15 Threaded rod adapter - 1x M6x18 Threaded rod adapter - 1x M8x22 Threaded rod adapter - 1x M10x25 Threaded rod adapter - 1x Hexagon 50mm Threaded brace foot assy - 1x Hex 50mm Threaded brace foot - 1x 1/4 BSPT to 1/4 BSPP Hex Adapter - 1x Bolt test adapter - 1x EU_30_10 Case empty - 1x 170x75x22 HAT 28_01 M Bridge assy - 3x leg hex 17x100 Bridge
